text: Their doctors give them #antivirals against #COVID19 #CoronavirusPandemic at the slightest hint of it - #Kaletra, #Remdesivir, #Camostat, #Hydroxychloroquine, #Chloroquine & another one that has been used for Rheumatoid Arthritis was incl in some successful trials against #COVID https://t.co/GL1LE6vAMh
